explanation: The majority of real-time opinions indicate a bullish sentiment for BTC, including direct calls for long positions, expectations of breaking all-time highs, and confidence in BTC's resilience at current support levels. There are isolated mentions of shorting or potential manipulation, but these are outweighed by strong positive comments and confirmations that BTC is holding up well and may see further upward movement.
representative_opinions: LORD UZI: long btc and sleep
LORD UZI: millions of dollars have been invested into the market to pump this time btc is going to break the all time high
